DBTComponent.content:
import subprocess
import sys
import os
import tempfile
import shlex
import re

git_clone_command = "git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/ashvjit-prophecy/test_repo_sql_public --branch __PROJECT_RELEASE_VERSION_PLACEHOLDER__ /tmp/DBT_0/aaef22b6-7ccb-4430-9d8e-924d0228eee3"
dbt_working_dir = "/tmp/DBT_0/aaef22b6-7ccb-4430-9d8e-924d0228eee3/test/sql/uitesting/P2_DB_Git"
dbt_commands = ['''dbt  deps --profile run_profile''','''dbt  seed --profile run_profile''','''dbt  run --profile run_profile''']
git_update_cmds = ['add-apt-repository -y ppa:git-core/ppa', 'apt update', 'apt install -y git']

def run_dbt():

    def run_cmd(cmd, cwd, env, shell = False, split=True):
        try:
            cmds = shlex.split(cmd) if split else cmd
            result = subprocess.run(cmds, capture_output=True, cwd=cwd, env=env, check=True, text=True, shell=shell)
            print(result.stdout)
            return result.stdout
        except subprocess.CalledProcessError as error:
            print(error.output)
            print(f"The command failed with exit status {error.returncode}")
            error_stderr = error.stderr
            if len(error_stderr) != 0 and not error_stderr.isspace():
                print(f"Error message: {error_stderr}")
            sys.exit(1)


    def update_git():
        with tempfile.NamedTemporaryFile(mode='w', delete=False) as f:
            f.write('''
#!/bin/bash

target_version="2.33.1"

# Get the Git version
git_version=$(git --version | awk '{print $3}')

# Compare versions using 'sort' command
if [[ "$(echo -e "$git_version\n$target_version" | sort -V | head -n1)" == "$target_version" ]]; then
  echo "Git version is $git_version"
else
  echo "Git version is $git_version, needs an upgrade"
  add-apt-repository -y ppa:git-core/ppa
  apt update
  apt install -y git
  echo "Git version upgraded to $(git --version | awk '{print $3}')"
fi

''')
            os.chmod(f.name, 0o700)
            
        cmd = f'bash {f.name}'
        run_cmd(cmd, ".", os.environ)
            
        os.unlink(f.name)    


    def get_secret():
        try:
            return dbutils.secrets.get("prophecy_jobs_6", "Test-Repo-SQL-Job-79-DBT_0-64849351")
        except Exception as e:
            print("Couldn't get secret")
            return ""


    secret = get_secret()
    db_token = ""
    git_token = ""
    semi_colon_hit = False


    for ch in secret:
        if (ch == ';'):
            semi_colon_hit = True
        elif (semi_colon_hit):
            git_token = git_token + ch
        else:
            db_token = db_token + ch

    secret = ""

    def move_profiles_to_current_dir():
        dbutils.fs.cp("dbfs:/FileStore/prophecy/artifacts/dev/ash/__PROJECT_ID_PLACEHOLDER__/__PROJECT_RELEASE_VERSION_PLACEHOLDER__/Test-Repo-SQL-Job/DBT_0-64849351/profiles.yml", "file:/tmp/DBT_0/aaef22b6-7ccb-4430-9d8e-924d0228eee3/test/sql/uitesting/P2_DB_Git/profiles.yml")

    def add_token_to_profile():
        with open("/tmp/DBT_0/aaef22b6-7ccb-4430-9d8e-924d0228eee3/test/sql/uitesting/P2_DB_Git/profiles.yml", "r+") as f:
            data = f.read()
            data = data.replace(f'{{{{ TOKEN }}}}', db_token)
            f.seek(0)
            f.write(data)
            f.truncate()


    def remove_profile():
        try:
            os.remove("/tmp/DBT_0/aaef22b6-7ccb-4430-9d8e-924d0228eee3/test/sql/uitesting/P2_DB_Git/profiles.yml")
            print(f'Successfully deleted generated profile')
        except OSError as e:
            print(f'Could not delete generated profile {e}')


    def prophecy_exec():
        # Update git to latest version, 2.25.1 in Databricks doesn't support sparse clone
        update_git()

        # Create a temporary script to output the token
        with tempfile.NamedTemporaryFile(mode='w', delete=False) as f:
            f.write(f'#!/bin/sh\necho {git_token}\n')
            os.chmod(f.name, 0o700)

        # Set the GIT_ASKPASS environment variable to the path of the script
        env = os.environ.copy()
        env['GIT_ASKPASS'] = f.name

        # Clone the repository
        run_cmd(git_clone_command, cwd=".", env=env)
        print("Repository clone complete")

        move_profiles_to_current_dir()
        add_token_to_profile()

        print("Running dbt commands")

        for cmd in dbt_commands:
            run_cmd(cmd, cwd=dbt_working_dir, env=env)

        # Clean up the temporary script
        os.unlink(f.name)

    prophecy_exec()
    git_token = ""
    db_token = ""

run_dbt()
DBTComponent.profileContent:
run_profile:
  target: profile_target
  outputs:
    profile_target:
      type: databricks
      schema: default
      host: dbc-147abc45-b6c7.cloud.databricks.com
      http_path: /sql/1.0/warehouses/2da936f35acda6b0
      token: {{ TOKEN }}
      catalog: hive_metastore
